name: Mohit Singh Parihar
title: Mechanical Engineer
objective: To make high-quality, exciting, and fun web and mobile applications that are challenging, provide opportunities to learn new technologies, and allow me to work with other highly motivated and talented developers.
aboutme: I am very interested in mechanical design and the interaction between mechanical components and electrical or simple computer systems (such as a microcontroller). I am also interested in startup companies.

education.school: Maharana Pratap College of Technology, Gwalior, India
education.program: Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Engineering
